[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/handlers/attack_messages.c

This handles the standard messages for attacks. I cannot be bothered rewriting the docs for this. This handles the standard messages for the given damage types: blunt, sharp, pierce, fire. There are also subtypes: blunt - hands, feet, tail, hoof, wrestle, pommel. sharp - claws, chew, slice, chop. pierce - bite, beak, stab, horns, tusks.

Written by pinkfish

Method index
